mapper.select: SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE vehiNo =#{vehiNo} and (isDeleted is null or isDeleted !=1)
SELECT area.* FROM ess_area AREA LEFT JOIN ess_organization org ON area.id=org.area_id WHERE org.id=#{id}

SELECT ise.etpNm,ise.etplawer,ve.owner,ve.mgrDepart,ve.telphone,ve.mobilephone,ve.adress,area.areaNm,ve.nature,attr1.attrNm as vehiNoTypeText,ve.vehiNoType, ve.vehiNo,ve.firstReciveTime,attr.attrNm as vehiTypeText,ve.vehiType,ve.examineForceEffectEndTime,ve.effectEndTime,ve.mbCar,ve.countrySideUse,ve.state FROM ( SELECT * FROM vehicle WHERE id=#{id} and (isDeleted is null or isDeleted !=1) )ve LEFT JOIN ess_area area ON ve.mgrDepartAreaId=area.id LEFT JOIN ess_enterprise ise ON ve.mgrEnterpriseId=ise.id LEFT JOIN param_category_attr attr1 ON ve.vehiNoType=attr1.attrCd LEFT JOIN param_category_attr attr ON ve.vehiType=attr.attrCd and attr.categoryCd = '024'
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM ${tableName} WHERE vehiNo=CONCAT('渝',#{vehiNo}) AND vehiNoType=#{vehiNoType}

SELECT id ,vehiNo,vehiNoType,mgrEnterpriseId,mgrDepartAreaId,effectEndTime,DATE_FORMAT(effectEndTime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS effectEndTime,DATE_FORMAT(examineEffectEndTime,'%Y-%m-%d') AS examineEffectEndTime FROM vehicle GROUP BY vehiNo,vehiNoType
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM vehicle where id in
#{item}
